List<Account> acctID = [Select id from Account limit 5];
List<String> reasonList = new List<String>{'User didn\'t attend training','Complex functionality','Existing problem','Instructions not clear','New problem'};
List<String> statusList = new List<String>{'On Hold','New','Escalated','New','Escalated'};
List<String> typeList = new List<String>{'Problem','Feature Request','Question','Problem','Question'};
List<String> priorityList = new List<String>{'High','Medium','Low','Low','Medium'};
List<String> originList = new List<String>{'Email','Phone','Web','Phone','Email'};
List<Case> Cl = new List<Case>();
for(Integer i=1;i<5;i++){
	Case a = new Case(
	    Reason =  reasonList[i],
		Status = statusList[i],
		Subject = 'Sample Case '+i,
		Type = typeList[i],
		AccountID = acctID[i].id,
		Priority = priorityList[i],
		Origin = originList[i]);
	cl.add(a);
	//System.Debug('Account Name is '+acctID[i].id);
}
insert cl;
